Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.foodi.model.daos

Class RecipeDao

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.foodi.model.daos.RecipeDao
public class RecipeDao extends Object
This class is responsible for handling the usage of database operations regarding stored recipes in the database.
Version:
0.9.0
